title: (Silver - Gold) [ObI] Oblivion Recruitment! Post a response to apply!
body:
Your application should include the following:

IGN (In Game Name):
Current Solo/Duo Queue Rank:
Preffered role(s) in game:
Reason for joining:
Skype or Teamspeak? (Required):

Example--

IGN: Jknixx
Current Solo/Duo Queue Rank: Silver I
Preffered role(s) in game: ADC
Reason for joining: "Oblivion" is basically the coolest name ever and whoever came up with it must be awesome (hint hint).
Skype or Teamspeak? (Required): **Either**

replies.body:
IGN: Sweaty Diarrhea
Current Solo/Duo Queue Rank: Silver 1
Preffered role(s) in game: Anything but top
Reason for joining: Need a team
Skype or Teamspeak? (Required): Both

GN (In Game Name): Spekc
Current Solo/Duo Queue Rank: Silver 3
Preffered role(s) in game: Mid/Adc
Reason for joining: Im looking to join a serious team to be successful with and im hoping this will be the one for me :)
Skype or Teamspeak? (Required): Both

IGN Darkzama
Current solo/duo queue rank: Silver 5
Preffered roles in game: Any except jungle xP
Reason for joining: I'd like to meet new people, learn to work better as a team, and progressively add on to my skill with a group that will help me grow.
Teamspeak,skype, curse.. I have it all :)

IGN (In Game Name): BerryStrduel
Current Solo/Duo Queue Rank: Silver 4
Preffered role(s) in game: ADC/Mid
Reason for joining: Looking to learn more and progress to become a better player while with a team
Skype or Teamspeak? (Required): either

IGN (In Game Name): VwS Peace
Current Solo/Duo Queue Rank: Plat 3
Preffered role(s) in game: Mid/Support
Reason for joining: Just looking to meet new people
Skype or Teamspeak? (Required): Yes I got both

IGN (In Game Name): ImTryingToLearn
Current Solo/Duo Queue Rank: Plat 5
Preffered role(s) in game: Midlane
Reason for joining: Ranked 5's is the most enjoyable part of league for me.
Skype or Teamspeak? (Required): Have both - will send username if I get added.

IGN (In Game Name): LordDarkshayde
Current Solo/Duo Queue Rank: Silver 5
Preffered role(s) in game: Mid
Reason for joining: Looking for a team that is willing to work together and will not fall apart after a wekk's time
Skype or Teamspeak? (Required): Skype (though I prefer Curse Voice as it is much lighter)
